descriptionHtml:
First standalone mod I ever made, so there's likely to have something be wrong. I just can't help it, I'm learning though.
<br />
<br />I used this preset: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72759/? to make her face. I heard it was requested, but my friend uses it for her character and I wanted her character to run around with mine! 

[url=http://s326.photobucket.com/user/athenablackheart/media/Aerina_zps8ieoh5fk.png.html][img]http://i326.photobucket.com/albums/k418/athenablackheart/Aerina_zps8ieoh5fk.png[/img][/url]
author: JessiTheVicious
